attributes.action: publish immediately Legg's requests for individual MPs to repay expenses wrongly claimed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that MPs who have strayed in their interpretation of claims will be given 3  weeks grace.Their names & details should be immediately made public and we should be aware of their reactions.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
